Description:
What a Pearler !
Do not hesitate to organise an inspection of this well-maintained property situated in Clifton Springs. With delightful leafy views framed by the full-sized window from the main living area this delightful home has something different that is worth exploring.
From the very impressive over-sized front door to the cathedral ceiling in the main living zone, polished floor boards, classy light fittings, renovated kitchen and three good sized bedrooms, complete with a fresh paint job and brand new carpets. Evaporative cooling, gas central heating and surround sound are also fitted to this established home.
But wait there is more, outside, the alfresco living area is the biggest deck you could imagine with enclosed spa that is meticulously cared for. This is a fantastic family space all year round. Manicured gardens, a great garden shed in the back yard and additional space behind secure double gates for the boat or trailer.
Public transport metres away makes getting to the local shopping precinct a breeze. Ten minutes to the Portarlington Ferry and Peninsula cafes and wineries this property is not to be missed !
Insights: 41 Dundundra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 48 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
WALK TO THE BEACH, ENJOY THE BAY VIEWS IN THIS PRIME POSITION.
Custom built, maintained diligently, with nothing to do but unpack and feel right at home. Formal lounge, well proportioned second area with living, well equipped kitchen and dining which opens to undercover decking all taking in the lights of Geelong, sunsets and fantastic views. Three bedrooms, main with ensuite (spa) and WIR., others have BIR'S and fourth bedroom or study, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include new central heating, evaporative cooling, woodburner, fans, bay window , alarm system, watertanks, outdoor blinds , ample storage and solar panels. Double garage, port for caravan and or boat. Be surprised at No. 48 here at the Point.
Insights: 48 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT INVESTMENT IN GROWTH AREA
Ideal addition to your investment portfolio, a perfect starter for either first home buyers, investors or those simply wishing to downsize. Upon entry, you are walking into an open plan living/dining area with a well-appointed timber kitchen, all capturing lots of natural light. Comprising 3 carpeted bedrooms, 1 bathroom separate toilet. This home sits on the high side of the street to obtain some views of Port Phillip Bay. Outside boasts a spacious outdoor entertaining area, in ground pool, garden shed and a carport behind gates with ample off street parking. Surrounded by well-established facilities including local schools, shopping centre, golf course and much more. The potential is endless for this charming property. A high growth suburb offering exceptional value in a highly sought after location. Now is your time to Make Your Move, a great opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 14 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Absolute Water Frontage!
- A truly exclusive and limited opportunity to secure a property boasting absolute water frontage and spectacular uninterrupted panoramic water views
- Charming light filled residence with an enviable 688m2 approx prime land holding
- Attractive bamboo flooring further enhances a lovely free flowing floor plan
- A fully equipped and sheltered decked entertaining zone provides year round comfort while you gaze across the waters edge, the impressive peaks of the You Yangs, the dazzling lights of the skyline and believe it or not you can even see if the snapper 'is on the bite' from your lounge chair
- 4 bedrooms of generous proportions (master compete with an ensuite and walk in robe)
- A modernised kitchen is light and bright, great storage solutions and expansive benchtops provide a great practical work space
- A warm and welcoming lounge showcases a floor to ceiling window feature which perfectly frames the deep blue vistas 'or' a classic sunset showcasing a full spectrum of pinks, oranges and deep shades of fire red.
- A 2nd living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
- A custom built carport provides room enough for multiple cars, the boat and a raised roof line ensures it can comfortably accommodate the caravan
- All modern comforts; ducted heating, dual split system cooling units and ceiling fans further endorse this properties user friendly nature
- Secure this impressive property and you are securing an amazing lifestyle; the highly regarded Clifton Springs Golf Club is literally at your back door, neighbouring award winning wine labels, a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, great schooling options and so much more to be discovered
- A genuine once in a life time opportunity to secure absolute water frontage on the Bellarine Peninsula - it could be argued that property of this calibre represents an unbelievable opportunity to capture exceptional capital growth and/or scope to further develop.
Insights: 182 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
WALK TO THE BOATRAMP, CLUBS AND THE DELL.
Located around the corner from the boatramp, this well positioned home on 580 sq/m is in a fantastic location. Corner block with side access for the boat, caravan or trailer. Double lock up garage and undercover entertaining area. 3 large bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR. 2nd and 3rd with BIR. Second bathroom and separate toilet along with an open plan kitchen, dining, lounge. 2nd spacious lounge upon entry along with split system AC, gas heating, cooking and water, this place is ready to move are you? And the outdoor undercover alfresco area finishes this great home.

Description:
Go up and grab a brilliant bay view
High on one of Clifton Springs' elevated vantage points, this neat 3 bedroom, brick-veneer home not only offers immediate comfort and ease of living - but also the potential to improve or develop (STCA). Another level would provide you with spectacular bay views.
With the added benefit of a quiet, friendly community, and a well-established garden back and front, there's a lot to like about this home.
The carport can handle two cars and the covered entrance delivers you directly into a welcoming lounge with a lovely northern view. A sliding door reveals a cosy dining area and a well-equipped kitchen which overlooks the rear garden and large storage shed.
Three bedrooms share the bathroom, which acts as an ensuite for the master bedroom at the front of the house. Laundry to outside clothesline. Two split-systems provide year-round comfort.
- Well-presented brick veneer home with potential to improve
- Lounge, dining, kitchen, laundry - two split systems
- Westinghouse electric oven and rangehood, ample storage
- 3 bedrooms, bathroom - ensuite for master bedroom
- Established front and rear gardens, side carport for 2 cars
- Renovate or develop (STCA) - bay views the reward.
Insights: 21 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Architectural Excellence
- A stunning architecturally designed property of the highest calibre
- Breathtaking panoramic views showcase the impressive peaks of the You Yang's and the dazzling lights over to the horizon from the vast deck space
- An impressive entrance makes quite the statement; the bespoke stair case delivers you to a light filled living area of grand proportions
- Luxurious Sydney Bluegum hard wood floors instantly create an anticipation of absolute top shelf finishes throughout (expansive stone bench tops and porcelain tiles just to name a few)
- A contemporary free flowing open floor plan boasts unrivalled size and scale; further enhanced by towering high ceilings
- The kitchen is without doubt one of the finest in today's property market; elegant stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, clever storage solutions and a walk in pantry deliver a not only sleek and stylish finish but working space fit for the chef of house (not to mention the sweeping water views)
- A gentle cascading upper level floor plan, wall to wall bi-fold glass doors provide a seamless connection from a wonderfully open sunken lounge to an expansive decked outdoor entertaining zone (this home was simply made for those who love to entertain); cedar timber roof panelling further endorse an unwavering brief of absolute quality craftsmanship
- 4 generous bedrooms; the master is complete with custom cabinetry, ensuite and dual corner set window features frame spectacular water views
- Downstairs living offers 3 bedrooms, family bathroom and a sunken rumpus to ensure room enough for the growing family.
-
A double remote garage offers internal access and rear access via a roller door.
- Exposed aggregate driveway, established tree line boundaries create a wonderfully private property.
- A highly desirable quiet court location. Close to shops and the water's edge.
- All the modern comforts one could expect from what is a top shelf executive residence; only upon inspection will you get a full appreciation of what this magnificent property offers
- The Bellarine Peninsula provides a unique opportunity to embrace a wonderful lifestyle, a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, highly regarded schooling options, award winning wine labels and beautiful beaches are just a few reasons to make the Bellarine home.
Insights: 6 Labulla Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
LOOKING FOR THE QUIET LIFE?
Looking for a home to add to your portfolio? Maybe you want to move here but are not quite ready? This home is currently tenanted with a tenant that maintains the home very well and would like to stay. Having said that maybe you are looking for your first home to enter the real estate market before the prices really hike up. Clifton Springs has seen a 10% growth in the last twelve months and indications are this will continue. Established suburb with everything you require. Serviced by four primary schools and two high schools, medical centres, shopping complexes, cafes, restaurants, walking/bike tracks and public transport. Play golf no problem here, come and see our newest edition the â??Curlewis Driving Rangeâ?. Historic village of Drysdale boasts The Bellarine Railway running holidays and weekends.
http://bellarinerailway.com.au/ great entertainment for the whole family and friends alike. On 585m2 block with a reserve at the rear, in a dead end street providing peace and quiet for our busy lives. What are you waiting for?
Insights: 47 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 65 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Stunning family home with views
Set on a good sized allotment this home takes full advantage of its elevated position across the road from the Clifton Springs Golf Course with just a short stroll to the Dell & boat ramp.
Comprising 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the master with walk in robes, a good sized lounge & dining room with elevated views, the spacious kitchen adjoins a second meals area & central family bathroom.
Features include polished Jarrah Floors throughout, reverse cycle cooling. The property has plenty of off street parking & space for a boat or caravan with a second driveway access & lock up garage.
Estimated selling range $420,000 to $460,000

Description:
Commercial Development With Dual-Occupancy Potential
A prime positioned commercial land parcel in the established Jetty Road retail precinct. Looking for a small-scale development opportunity or keen to expand on the commercial sector of your portfolio?
- Planning permit already granted offering a ready-made development opportunity
- Acquire and take advantage of this affordable 204sqm approx site.
- The land assets of the site are length and potential height to capture ocean views.
- Build for dual occupancy with street level retail and second story apartment
- Set amid an established retail strip and residential area, and close to civil facilities.
- Existing businesses inc: milk bar; bottle shop; fish & chips and medical centre.
- Excellent parking with a separate generously sized designated area.
- All development STCA.
The gentrification of this residential pocket is on the horizon. The economic growth indicators already present with the drivers of population change from the designated growth area of Curlewis.

Description:
WOW! 2 DWELLINGS, DOUBLE BLOCK, DEVELOP (STCA) OR EXTENDED LIVING.
A fantastic situation to do what you want now or later, the main home has entrance, lounge , meals and kitchen area with french doors opening to the outside , three bedrooms with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Polished floors , gas heating and fan. The second dwelling is a two bedroom unit with kitchen, bathroom, gas heating and airconditioner. The outdoor space is big , has two crossovers for easy access, drive in and out with ease. Double garage , single carport and plenty of space for boat, caraven and truck. Good central position with the chance of views maybe! That phrase, " many options" , well it really applys here, B&B , extended living, develop, work from home, invest..........take your pick.

Description:
Build your Coastal Dream home with views!
At the end of a quiet cul de sac lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. From your large elevated block, capture incredible views of the bay overlooking the You Yangs and simply sit back, and watch the gentle boating traffic whilst you have your morning coffee.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.
Build your dream home in this prime coastal locale, close to some of Victoria’s best beaches. Land size 863m2 (approx)

Description:
Coolangatta Gold!
The Facts:
-Charming residence boasting water views
-2 huge bedrooms (master with walk in robe) and 2 generous living areas
-Modernised kitchen and bathroom
-Lovely land holding of approximately 591m2 (19m frontage)
-X2 carport and further off street parking options
-Lovely light and bright home with a northerly rear orientation
The Features:
Clifton Springs is undoubtedly one of the hottest property markets on the Bellarine Peninsula - all the key indicators forecast further growth in 2018. The property presents a ticket into the property market at what seemed an impossible entry level - and yes believe it or not 'water views'. A charming 2 bedroom residence offering an array of options... a great first home, a property with great renovation scope or a savvy addition to an investor's portfolio. Boasting a northerly rear orientation the 2 spacious living areas are bathed in natural light and take in water views. A modernized kitchen is eye catching and offers a great practical space for those who love to cook and entertain. A separate lounge provides a lovely casual space, an exposed brick wall and corner set window are both features. The bathroom has also been modernized and is light and bright. A split system provides heating and cooling comforts. A double carport and a generous backyard ensure this property represents genuine value for money.
Insights: 52 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Single Storey Sensation!
Outstanding property for families, first home buyers or investors.
Featuring four bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, single garage and large back yard.
Offering an open-plan and light filled kitchen, meals, and family area, decked out with modern style. Bathroom is centrally located, with additional ensuite and walk-in wardrobe in the master. Built-in wardrobes feature in each bedroom. Accommodate guests under the pergola which adjoins on to a huge rear yard, perfect for little ones' play, pets, or outdoor hobbies.
Also includes:
- Wood and ducted heating
- Secure parking garage with rear access
- Water tank
- Courtyard
The property is only a short walk from the Whitcombes Rd shopping precinct, transport, reserves and golf clubs. Schools and shops are all within driving distance. To secure your piece of the growing Bellarine peninsula, get in touch with our agent Suzanna Levic on 0490816017 and arrange an inspection before it's snapped up!

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT !!! A Stunning Block, Well Above Par!
Backing onto the 9th tee of the Clifton Springs Golf Club, this north facing vacant block has incredible views across the bay to the You Yangs and offers endless possibilities to build a stunning residence. Create your dream retreat in this peaceful coastal enclave, close to the popular boat ramp and next door to one of the Bellarine’s most picturesque golf courses. Existing fencing and established private boundary hedging provide the perfect canvas on which to start planning. An easy commute to Melbourne is 10 minutes away via the Portarlington - Melbourne ferry and Geelong is an easy 30 min drive. Invest in the serenity of Clifton Springs and start planning your dream home, a stone's throw from to the region's wineries, beaches and stunning scenery, all with peaceful 150mt par 3 at your doorstep.

Address: 30 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Bay End Classic
Expansive views of Corio Bay are the opening act for this quality built, established home at 30 Country Club Drive on approx. 585m2. Located within five minutes walk to the water and Clifton Springs Golf Club greens. Soak in the tranquility from you own bay side haven. This quality home was built to last the test of time. Parking galore onsite includes a triple drive through garage and workshop. It's all about outdoor entertaining in the warmer months where the deck can be accessed from the back garden or the family living area upstairs. Inspection of this immaculately presented home is a must.
Downstairs features include two queen size bedrooms with walk in robes, spacious family bathroom, massive laundry with linen shute and abundant storage throughout with internal access to the garage area.
Upstairs the decor is neutral with the abundant living space flooded with natural light. Quality speaks to you from the solid timber floors and cabinetry, floor coverings and window furnishings. The kitchen has great work space and a walkin pantry large enough for that extra freezer and appliances.
The gracious main suite completes the upstairs living area and comprises walk through robes and ensuite with bath and separate toilet.
Extras include solar panels, evaporative cooling, central gas heating , security shutter to main bedroom. Inspection a must !
Insights: 30 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPACE AND PRIVACY
Our young family has already started writing the chapter for their next life's journey and are very keen to get there. They are looking for someone who will enjoy this home as much as they have, and can't wait to show you what's on offer. We have had many requests for larger space, peace, quiet and privacy. This family home will tick your wish list.
In a quiet street in Clifton Springs a suburb on the Bellarine Peninsula is where the current family love the visibility to watch the children from the front and the back. A high fence keeps the kids and animals safe. Having been built in 1972 we know that they don't build them like this anymore. As they say in they say in the trade "it has good bones".
Large lounge room with a bay window seat, along with the added warmth of the wood heater in winter. One bathroom has been renovated and is now combined with the laundry. The shed could be tradie heaven, with another area nearby that could be become a man cave or extra accommodation for visitors. Thinking outside the square a fire pit has been placed in the top right hand corner of the block to make the most of the view. An outdoor shower for when you return from the beach or fishing. For me I would enjoy sitting under the Al Fresco area drinking coffee or wine listening to the trickle of the pond.
Enough about the outside, inside is a cosy place to be hanging out with family and friends. Time for you to come see for yourself. Let me show you what's behind the fence.
Insights: 14-16 Almerta Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
